p: The patient suffered a cytokine storm in the hospital. Forty-eight cytokines and chemokines were tested. Among them, the levels of 32 cytokines and chemokines including IL-1ra, IL-6, IP-10, IL-10, IFN-γ, MCP-3, IL-18, HGF, MCP-1, MIG, IL-2Rα, IL-12(p40), IL-8, MIP-1α, PDGF-BB, G-CSF, CTACK, MIF, SCF, HGF, IL-16, SCGF-β, RANTES, TNF-α, FGF basic, IL-2, IL-17, MIF, MIP-1β, SCF, SDF-1α, and TRAIL were elevated in the patient. The levels of ten cytokines and chemokines including MIG, IL-1ra, IL-6, IP-10, IL-10, IFN-γ, MCP-3, IL-18, HGF, MCP-1 were dramatically higher in this patient ( Figure 1) compared with those in the healthy controls.
